jd: From: Venkat, KK Software Associates venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com We are hiring Azure Cloud Enterprise Architect for one of my Client in Location: Detroit, MI interesting candidates please send resumes to venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com (614) 335-4419 Position: Azure Cloud Enterprise ArchitectLocation: Detroit, MIVisa status: : Strictly Don’t share F1, OPT, OPT EAD, L2 EAD and H4 EAD work permit Azure - Data Factory, Log Analytics, Databricks, Synapse, Power BI, ADLS Gen2,GCP Cloud storage and Big QueryRetail Media Data Movement experienceGoogle Marketing platform, Salesforce MCI, The Trade Desk, AD VendioPower BI, Data Modelling, Data Classification and zones, data movement, Data architecture and reportingPython and API architecture in AzureDesigns, codes, tests, and implements data movement pipelines, dashboarding and analytical assets; develops system documentation according to SAFe Agile principles and industry standards.Design and hands-on development on either vendor or internal applications and interfaces including Azure - Data Factory, Log Analytics, Databricks, Synapse, Power BI, ADLS Gen2, GCP Cloud storage and Big Query Assist in configuration and administration of marketing platforms (Google Marketing platform, Salesforce MCI, The Trade Desk etc., ADvendio) that the team supports Build data ingestion into and out of the above listed marketing platforms Gathers and implements functional and non-functional requirements including performance monitoring, alerting and code management and ensuring alignment with technology best practices and SLAs.Partnering with all areas of the business to gather requirements for Data and Analytics and designing solutions.Participate in agile ceremonies and follow agile cadence to build, test and deliver solutions Driving engagement with ITS Security and Infrastructure teams to ensure secure development and deployment of solutions.Interfaces with the Product Manager and IT partners at the Program level and within other Release Trains to define and estimate features for agile teams.
